name: 13th Summer School on IoT, blockchain and applications - SenZations 2018
content: The Internet of Things (IoT) is one of the most important and fastest moving technology developments of recent times. Combined with blockchainâ€™s ability to provide security and transparency of transactions and data utilization, it offers an abundance of opportunities for engineers, technologists, researchers and business minded people. This summer you have the unique opportunity to immerse yourself into the latest IoT and blockchain technology trends in a relaxed environment. Join us! Register and book your place now! Registration form is avlaible at: http://senzations.net/registration-2018/
